import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Bell, Settings, User, Home as HomeIcon, Plus, ChevronDown } from 'lucide-react'; import GestionEscaleta from '../Dominio/ModelosDeDominio/GestionEscaleta'; import './PlantillaBase.css'; import 'bootstrap-icons/font/bootstrap-icons.css'; const PlantillaBase = () => { const gestionEscaleta = new GestionEscaleta(); const [elements, setElements] = useState([]); const [showZcPl, setShowZcPl] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { setElements(gestionEscaleta.getElements()); }, []); const addElement = () => { setElements(gestionEscaleta.addElement()); }; const removeElement = (id) => { setElements(gestionEscaleta.removeElement(id)); }; const toggleZcPl = (id) => { setShowZcPl(showZcPl === id ? null : id); }; const fechaActual = new Date().toLocaleDateString('es-ES', { day: '2-digit', month: 'long', year: 'numeric', }); return (
